title: If my ranking is going to be messed up or not.
body: I used to play on this account a lot in Season 4 and was bad so I was in bronze. I left this account to start a new one and basically never played on it for 2 seasons.  I decided to start playing on it again in Season 7 and winning my first 3 games I realized my MMR is Bronze 3 after 3 wins in a row. If my rank was bronze in Season 4, does it affect my placements in Season 7? Thank you

replies.body:
There was a soft MMR reset just before the 2017 started, but yes, the last ranked season you played in will have a small impact on your starting MMR for the new ranked season, regardless of when that last season was.

I hope that helps, let me know if you have any other questions! ^.^
